title: The Best American Erotica 1996
description: The Best American Erotica 1996 is the ideal collection for all lovers of first-rate erotic literature. Edited by Susie Bright, whom the Utne Reader calls "one of the leading thinkers and visionaries of our time," this fourth annual edition of a best selling series brings together the most outstanding erotic writing of the yearâ€”including peculiarly dark and dangerous tales, as well as cutting-edge forays into the world of cybersex.
author: Susie Bright
